hook.text: A restaurant labels one dish 'most popular.' Orders for that item double overnight.

buildup.text: When uncertain, people look to others for guidance on what to choose.

discovery.text: Social proof powers reviews, bestseller lists, and 'trusted by 10,000 teams' badges.

twist.text: It works even when fabricated. Fake reviews still boost sales by 20%.

climax.text: The most powerful social proof comes from people similar to the buyer.

punchline.text: We follow the crowd, especially in doubt.

quiz.question: When is social proof most effective?
options: When it comes from people similar to the buyer
When it features celebrity endorsements only
